snippet: Some top players just grind out wins, playing better than their opponents. But there are a few who have an extra insight into the game, seeing possibilities that many would reject or never consider.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at the semifinals of the women's trial for the World Mind Sports Games.
lead_paragraph: Some top players just grind out wins, playing better than their opponents. But there are a few who have an extra insight into the game, seeing possibilities that many would reject or never consider.

headline.seo: Bridge - Judi Radin at Trial for World Mind Sports Games
headline.main: Judi Radin at Trial for World Mind Sports Games
